appendix.title: Porting and compatibility notes
appendix.para: At this time, there's a Makefile in the &app; tarball that you can use to try to build &app; on &freebsdver;.

listitem.para: &libx; must be installed first, and httportmap must be running.
Extract the tarball's contents into a temporary directory, then from the &freebsdverdir; subdirectory run make makesum followed by make install (or make package).
Add stasherd_enable=YES to /etc/rc.conf. This starts &app; when the server boots for any and all nodes installed in &freebsdprefix;/nodes/*.
